translation.es: y me dijo: "Hay mucho humo saliendo de Whakaari,

translation.en: Is your brother all right?"
translation.es: ¿está todo bien?".

translation.en: And I said, "Well, I think so." I said, "I haven't heard anything.
translation.es: Y le dije: "Creo que sí, no oí nada.

translation.en: But I believe, hey, Hayden would let us know."
translation.es: Pero supongo que Hayden nos avisaría".

translation.en: And I looked through the gap out to the ocean there.
translation.es: Y miré hacia el mar

translation.en: And man, she was… there was… a big plume of smoke had come up.
translation.es: y, vaya, había una enorme columna de humo.

translation.en: [Mark Law] I was driving along the coast,
translation.es: Iba conduciendo por la costa

translation.en: and that's when I noticed a really, really big plume,
translation.es: y vi una enorme columna,

translation.en: bigger than normal and definitely darker than normal.
translation.es: más grande y, sin duda, más oscura de lo normal.

translation.en: I was looking at it, looking at going, "That's… something happening."
translation.es: La vi y pensé: "Está pasando algo".

translation.en: [man] Volcanic Air had a message that there'd been an eruption.
translation.es: Volcanic Air emitió un mensaje de que había habido una erupción.

translation.en: I had actually been able to view on one of the volcano cameras,
translation.es: Yo pude ver una de las cámaras volcánicas,

translation.en: located at the coast at Whakatāne.
translation.es: ubicada en la costa de Whakatane.

translation.en: I think it became pretty apparent that, you know, sitting back and doing nothing wasn't an option.
translation.es: Obviamente, quedarme de brazos cruzados no era una opción.

translation.en: We knew that there were people on the Island.
translation.es: Sabíamos que había gente en la isla.

translation.en: We had the means and the ability to try and help
translation.es: Teníamos los medios y la capacidad para ayudar.

translation.en: and it's just the right thing to do, and that's what we did.
translation.es: Era lo que debíamos hacer y fue lo que hicimos.

translation.en: [Mark Law] Like all things, you know,
translation.es: Como con todo,

translation.en: when it comes down to making decisions and things happening,
translation.es: cuando hay que tomar una decisión y ponerse en acción,

translation.en: you either do or you don't. So I do.
translation.es: o lo haces o no, y yo hago.

translation.en: I called Tim and I said, "I'm going."
translation.es: Llamé a Tim y le dije: "Voy".

translation.en: And he said, "Yeah, I'll see you up there."
translation.es: Y me dijo: "Nos vemos allí".

translation.en: I called two really experienced people that worked for me.
translation.es: Llamé a dos personas de mucha experiencia que trabajaban para mí.

translation.en: I said "Go and get a machine out ready to go, fuel it up.
translation.es: Les dije: "Preparen una máquina para salir,

translation.en: Grab some gear that you think we might need,
translation.es: cárguenle gasolina, tomen lo que crean necesario,

translation.en: grab some extra masks and some water."
translation.es: unas máscaras extra y algo de agua".

translation.en: And then they took off. A few moments later, I lifted.
translation.es: Y despegaron. Y unos minutos más tarde lo hice yo.

translation.en: [Mark Law] You could hear all the chit-chat going on on the radio
translation.es: La gente conversaba por la radio,

translation.en: and that's when I heard John Funnell's voice.
translation.es: y en eso escuché la voz de John Funnell.

translation.en: [man] I was actually
translation.es: Estaba justamente

translation.en: doing some flying at Whakatāne in my airplane,
translation.es: volando mi avión por Whakatane,

translation.en: just testing out some new equipment.
translation.es: probando unos equipos nuevos.

translation.en: That's when I heard Mark Law on the radio, calling for a fixed-wing.
translation.es: Y escuché a Mark Law por radio pidiendo una aeronave de ala fija.

translation.en: [Mark Law] We needed someone circling overhead who was like a relay station
translation.es: Necesitábamos a alguien que hiciera las veces de estación difusora

translation.en: or a means of passing communication,
translation.es: o que fuera un medio de comunicación

translation.en: because there is very limited cell phone coverage on White Island.
translation.es: porque hay muy poca cobertura de móvil en Isla Blanca.

translation.en: There's no fixed radio or any radio system there.
translation.es: No hay estación radioeléctrica fija ni ningún sistema radioeléctrico.

translation.en: [John] I volunteered my help.
translation.es: Ofrecí mi ayuda.

translation.en: I had plenty of fuel, I had the ability to get out there.
translation.es: Tenía mucha gasolina y podía llegar allí.

translation.en: And uh, never gave it a thought about not going.
translation.es: Ni siquiera consideré no ir.

translation.en: [Brian] All the victims were kind of laid around the boat,
translation.es: Las víctimas estaban dispersas por el barco,

translation.en: uh, at the front, at the back.
translation.es: por adelante y por atrás.

translation.en: We all kind of fell into our own roles, assisting people.
translation.es: Cada uno tenía su tarea de asistir a la gente.

translation.en: I think every one of us on that boat did help quite a bit.
translation.es: Creo que todos en ese barco ayudaron.

translation.en: [Geoff] So we're dealing with exposed hands,
translation.es: Estábamos lidiando con manos,

translation.en: legs, faces, but the burns were far worse than that.
translation.es: piernas y rostros expuestos, pero lo peor eran las quemaduras.

translation.en: I remember that being a key moment where I thought
translation.es: Ese fue un momento clave en el que pensé:

translation.en: "What would burn you through an item of clothing,
translation.es: "¿Qué puede atravesar una prenda y quemarnos

translation.en: but didn't burn the clothing?"
translation.es: sin quemar la prenda?".

translation.en: I realized actually that the steam caused injuries far worse, that we couldn't see.
translation.es: Allí entendí que el vapor provocó heridas mucho más graves, que no veíamos.

translation.en: [Matt] There wasn't room for us in the cabin.
translation.es: No teníamos lugar en cabina.

translation.en: We actually ended up riding on the bow of the ship,
translation.es: Terminamos viajando en la proa,

translation.en: getting splashed by salt water in the cold air and the sun.
translation.es: salpicados por el agua salada, expuestos al aire frío y al sol.

translation.en: It was a horrific ride back.
translation.es: Fue un trayecto horripilante.

translation.en: [Kelsey] I just keep looking up at the horizon thinking,
translation.es: Miraba hacia el horizonte y pensaba:

translation.en: "How are we not there yet? Surely it's been hours." [chuckles]
translation.es: "¿Cómo puede ser que no lleguemos todavía? Ya pasaron horas".

translation.en: But yeah, I mean you could hear the boat at just total capacity,
translation.es: El barco estaba yendo a máxima potencia.

translation.en: and so yeah it was like, "Keep going boat. Keep going Phoenix."
translation.es: Pensé: "Sigue andando, vamos, Phoenix".

translation.en: [Isaac] The Phoenix had about 26 injured
translation.es: El Phoenix tenía unos 26 heridos

translation.en: or critically injured people on board.
translation.es: a bordo, algunos críticos.

translation.en: That's when I thought,
translation.es: Allí fue que pensé:

translation.en: "Shit, there's a whole boatload of people that are still to be accounted for."
translation.es: "Rayos, todavía queda un barco más de gente".

translation.en: [Jesse] I've neared the acid lake.
translation.es: Estaba cerca del lago de ácido.

translation.en: I was just sitting there rocking… rocking in pain.
translation.es: Allí sentado, meciéndome del dolor.

translation.en: Everything, my whole body was just tingling. I had, I could see my arms,
translation.es: Me ardía el cuerpo entero, me vi los brazos

translation.en: uh, covered in gray ash.
translation.es: cubiertos de ceniza gris.

translation.en: And I was thinking, "I'm gonna die here. I'm gonna die. That's going to be it."
translation.es: Y pensé: "Voy a morir, aquí se acaba todo".

translation.en: I was sat in the middle of about half a dozen or more people.
translation.es: Estaba sentado en medio de unas seis personas.

translation.en: People who were dead or dying.
translation.es: Gente muerta o por morir.

translation.en: In that time, you could hear the voices slowly start to dissipate.
translation.es: Escuchaba que las voces se iban disipando lentamente.

translation.en: The screaming becoming less frequent.
translation.es: Los gritos se hacían menos frecuentes.

translation.en: The crying becoming more quiet.
translation.es: Los llantos se iban acallando.

translation.en: I knew you've got your highest likelihood of surviving
translation.es: Sabía que la probabilidad de sobrevivir

translation.en: any kind of trauma if you've received medical assistance within the first hour.
translation.es: cualquier trauma es alta si recibes asistencia médica durante la primera hora.

translation.en: After sitting there for half an hour,
translation.es: Luego de estar ahí media hora,

translation.en: I came to the realization that no one was coming.
translation.es: me di cuenta de que no vendría nadie.

translation.en: And then something just clicked.
translation.es: Y en eso se me ocurrió algo.

translation.en: Just get up and go and go find some help.
translation.es: "Álzate y ve a buscar ayuda".

translation.en: Standing up and walking away from my parents,
translation.es: Ponerme de pie y alejarme de mis padres

translation.en: that was… I would say, the toughest thing I've ever had to do.
translation.es: fue lo más duro que me tocó hacer en la vida.

translation.en: But once I did find that strength, it was less so a walk,
translation.es: Pero cuando junté fuerzas, más que caminar,

translation.en: but more of a stumble. A forceful pushing myself just to keep on walking.
translation.es: avancé a lo tumbos, obligándome a seguir caminando.

translation.en: [Brian] Fifteen to twenty minutes into the trip back,
translation.es: A los quince minutos de emprender el regreso,

translation.en: that's where people started kind of screaming out,
translation.es: la gente empezó a pedir a los gritos:

translation.en: just saying "I need water! I need water!"
translation.es: "¡Necesito agua! ¡Agua!".

translation.en: [Geoff] We just did what we could with Matt and Lauren.
translation.es: Hicimos lo que pudimos con Matt y Lauren

translation.en: And these guys at the front.
translation.es: y la gente de adelante.

translation.en: What was in my first aid kit
translation.es: Lo que tenía en mi kit de primeros auxilios

translation.en: was of far less value than the container.
translation.es: era mucho menos valioso que el recipiente en sí.

translation.en: I tipped everything out of my first aid kit and started to fill it with water.
translation.es: Quité todo lo que tenía dentro y lo llené de agua.

translation.en: We just start to pour cold water just over their hands,
translation.es: Comenzamos a arrojarles agua fría en las manos,

translation.en: over what we can see that is exposed.
translation.es: lo que veíamos que estaba expuesto.

translation.en: [Brian] Everybody was screaming for relief in a certain way.
translation.es: Pedían a los gritos algún tipo de alivio.

translation.en: I think we were all just doing what we could at that time.
translation.es: Hicimos lo que pudimos en ese momento.

translation.en: I was told a few times,
translation.es: Me dijeron varias veces:

translation.en: you know, "You need to sit down.
translation.es: "Debes sentarte,

translation.en: You probably inhaled a lot of ash and stuff."
translation.es: seguramente inhalaste mucha ceniza".

translation.en: But um… it's very hard to sit down in a situation like that,
translation.es: Pero es muy difícil quedarse sentado en una situación así.

translation.en: you know. So you just keep going.
translation.es: Así que sigues adelante.

translation.en: [Lauren] They wrapped me in a blanket to keep me warm,
translation.es: Me envolvieron en una manta para mantenerme abrigada,

translation.en: and then Geoff Hopkins even, you know, kept his body to keep me warm.
translation.es: y Geoff Hopkins incluso me abrigó con su cuerpo.

translation.en: [Geoff] She tells me, "I'm… I'm not going to make it.
translation.es: Me dijo: "No voy a sobrevivir.

translation.en: I'm not going to make it."
translation.es: No voy a poder".

translation.en: "Yes, you are. This isn't the end of your life.
translation.es: "Sobrevivirás, este no es el final de tu vida.

translation.en: You have got many years ahead of you."
translation.es: Tienes muchos años por delante".

translation.en: She asked if I would just hold her hand,
translation.es: Me pidió si podía sostenerle la mano

translation.en: and I couldn't, hold it, because it was just so badly burnt.
translation.es: y no podía por lo quemada que estaba.

translation.en: [Lauren] I'm not normally a religious person, but I remember praying to God,
translation.es: No soy una persona religiosa, pero recuerdo pedirle a Dios

translation.en: that He would just end my life,
translation.es: que acabara con mi vida

translation.en: just so I wasn't in pain anymore. And that's where I lost consciousness.
translation.es: para no sufrir más dolor y allí me desmayé.

translation.en: [Jesse] It was very difficult for me to breathe.
translation.es: Me costaba mucho respirar.

translation.en: My legs felt heavy.
translation.es: Las piernas me pesaban.

translation.en: There was a lot of effort every single step uh, to keep going forward.
translation.es: Cada paso que daba era un gran esfuerzo.

translation.en: I recall Hayden previously telling us in the safety brief to try
translation.es: Recordé que en las instrucciones de seguridad, Hayden nos había dicho

translation.en: to follow the stream back to the beach.
translation.es: de seguir el arroyo hasta la playa.

translation.en: I rounded a bend where I had to cross the stream.
translation.es: Rodeé una curva por donde tuve que cruzar el arroyo.

translation.en: It was very hot, it was burning, and I had to jump across it.
translation.es: El agua estaba muy caliente, ardía, tuve que saltarla.

translation.en: And all I wanted to do was just to sit down again.
translation.es: Lo único que quería era volver a sentarme.

translation.en: But I knew if I take a break and sit down, I'm not going to get back up again.
translation.es: Pero sabía que si hacía una pausa y me sentaba, no volvería a levantarme.

translation.en: [Mark Law] As I got to the Island, you could see
translation.es: Cuando llegué a la isla, pude ver

translation.en: it was still ashing quite significantly.
translation.es: que todavía había mucha ceniza.

translation.en: Quite a column of ash and steam.
translation.es: Una gran columna de ceniza y humo.

translation.en: So I thought, "Well okay. I'll have a look around."
translation.es: Así que pensé en echar un vistazo.

translation.en: So I flew into the crater.
translation.es: Volé sobre el cráter.

translation.en: I remember looking down and going, "Gosh, that looks like a person.
translation.es: Miré hacia abajo y dije: "Dios mío, eso es una persona.

translation.en: That looks like more.
translation.es: Y allí parece haber más.

translation.en: No, it looks like a guy sitting."
translation.es: Y allí parece que hay alguien sentado".

translation.en: And then I thought, "Hang on, there's a lot more."
translation.es: Y luego me di cuenta de que había muchos más.

translation.en: [John] I was trying to fly with both radios and the cell phone.
translation.es: Estaba intentando volar con las dos radios y el móvil.

translation.en: I was keeping upwind of the ash cloud, and to one side,
translation.es: Volé en contra de la dirección de la nube de ceniza, de lado.

translation.en: just going backwards and forwards.
translation.es: Iba de un lado al otro.

translation.en: I knew that we had to get information out to the authorities
translation.es: Sabía que debíamos informar a las autoridades

translation.en: as to how bad the situation was so they could plan
translation.es: sobre la gravedad de la situación para que pudieran planear

translation.en: and put more resources in if needed.
translation.es: y disponer más recursos de ser necesario.

translation.en: [John] I said to Mark, "We need to know the number of dead
translation.es: Le dije a Mark: "Necesitamos saber la cantidad de muertos

translation.en: and the number of injured."
translation.es: y la cantidad de heridos".

translation.en: [Mark Law] I tried to land in a couple places too dusty,
translation.es: Intenté aterrizar, pero todo estaba muy cubierto de ceniza.

translation.en: and so I found one of my wood helipads,
translation.es: Y encontré una de mis plataformas de madera

translation.en: and zeroed in onto that,
translation.es: y apunté allí.

translation.en: and just flew straight into it, into sort of like a brown-out.
translation.es: Volé directo allí, con visibilidad casi cero.

translation.en: [Mark Law] I left the aircraft running. Grabbed my mask and jumped out.
translation.es: Bajé corriendo de la aeronave. Tomé la máscara y salí.

translation.en: I then picked up some footprints down the creek.
translation.es: Vi unas huellas por el arroyo.

translation.en: [Tim] And I was focused on planning my approach into the Island,
translation.es: Me concentré en planear mi acercamiento a la isla,

translation.en: you know, it was really dusty.
translation.es: había mucha ceniza.

translation.en: So, we had to be pretty committed to our landing.
translation.es: Debíamos aterrizar con mucho cuidado.

translation.en: I initially forgot my mask and I didn't get very far from the helicopter
translation.es: Al principio olvidé la máscara y, apenas me alejé del helicóptero,

translation.en: before I realized it was hard breathing out there.
translation.es: me di cuenta de que me costaba respirar.

translation.en: It was really hard. You had to have a mask on.
translation.es: Era muy difícil, había que usar máscara.

translation.en: [Tim] Saw one person, then I saw another.
translation.es: Vi a una persona, luego a otra.

translation.en: Saw a bunch just sort of further up.
translation.es: Vi a unas más un poco más adelante.

translation.en: Conscious, just, but barely conscious.
translation.es: Apenas conscientes.

translation.en: Some people crying out louder than others.
translation.es: Algunas personas gritaban más fuerte que otras.

translation.en: [John] I could form a picture of what was happening down there.
translation.es: Pude darme una idea de lo que estaba pasando allí.

translation.en: We just kept finding more and more people all the time that needed help,
translation.es: Seguíamos encontrando gente que necesitaba ayuda,

translation.en: and it was just… it became very obvious very quickly to me,
translation.es: y pronto me di cuenta

translation.en: it was a major calamity we had on our hands.
translation.es: de que estábamos frente a una gran calamidad.

translation.en: [Mark Law] I called the guys in.
translation.es: Llamé a los muchachos

translation.en: I gave them a brief. I said, "Look, there's a lot of people here.
translation.es: y les pasé el informe. "Aquí hay mucha gente.

translation.en: Quite a few of them are dead.
translation.es: Hay varios muertos.

translation.en: There's a lot alive and we're going to go to all of them."
translation.es: Hay muchos vivos e iremos a rescatar a todos".

translation.en: [John] We were passing the information to air traffic control.
translation.es: Le pasamos la información al control de tráfico aéreo.

translation.en: So that they would direct the two Westpac Rescue helicopters into White Island.
translation.es: Para que enviaran los dos helicópteros Westpac Rescue a Isla Blanca.

translation.en: I said, "We've got people in extreme pain here
translation.es: Dije: "Hay gente padeciendo un dolor terrible,

translation.en: and we've got no medical equipment.
translation.es: y no tenemos equipos médicos.

translation.en: We've got no helicopters with stretchers.
translation.es: No tenemos helicópteros con camillas.

translation.en: We need you guys here on the Island."
translation.es: Los necesitamos en la isla".

translation.en: They responded straight away.
translation.es: Respondieron de inmediato.

translation.en: "We'll come direct."
translation.es: "Iremos directamente".

translation.en: So I called Mark up and said "Help's on its way.
translation.es: Llamé a Mark y le dije: "La ayuda va en camino.

translation.en: It… it will get better soon."
translation.es: Será mejor que llegue rápido".

translation.en: [Mark Law] So at that time, we just started working through
translation.es: En ese momento, nos pusimos a ayudar

translation.en: all the folks on the ground,
translation.es: a la gente que estaba allí.

translation.en: really just clearing their airways,
translation.es: Les despejamos las vías respiratorias.

translation.en: clearing their noses, putting some people in recovery positions,
translation.es: Les limpiamos la nariz, los colocamos en postura de recuperación,

translation.en: putting gas masks back on people,
translation.es: les volvimos a colocar las máscaras

translation.en: and dabbing water where we could.
translation.es: les volvimos a colocar las máscaras y les pusimos agua donde pudimos.

translation.en: And just continuing until we got further assistance.
translation.es: Hicimos eso a la espera de la asistencia.

translation.en: The ash was still falling on us. And then every now and again we'd hear
translation.es: Nos seguía cayendo ceniza y, de tanto en tanto, escuchábamos

translation.en: big, you know, booms as stuff was going on in the plume.
translation.es: explosiones dentro de la columna de humo.

translation.en: Anyway, cracked on.
translation.es: Así y todo, seguimos.

translation.en: [Isaac] The Whakatāne Coast Guard boat met the Phoenix just about halfway
translation.es: El barco de la guardia costera se cruzó a mitad de camino con el Phoenix

translation.en: back to Whakatāne, pulled up alongside.
translation.es: y se detuvieron uno al lado del otro.

translation.en: The skipper advised that they had multiple critical people on board.
translation.es: El capitán advirtió que tenían a bordo mucha gente herida de gravedad.

translation.en: So it was elected to put the ambulance crew
translation.es: Así que se decidió que los paramédicos

translation.en: on board the Phoenix to assist with their care for their return trip.
translation.es: subieran a bordo del Phoenix para asistir durante el viaje.

translation.en: Paramedics jump on and then suddenly we were away again.
translation.es: Los paramédicos se subieron, y reanudamos el regreso.

translation.en: My expectation was, "Ah, the paramedics will take over."
translation.es: Mi esperanza era que los paramédicos se hicieran cargo del asunto.

translation.en: But the reality was even though they had a big kit,
translation.es: Pero por más que tuvieran un kit grande,

translation.en: there wasn't anything in that kit that was going to help.
translation.es: no había nada allí dentro que fuera de ayuda.

translation.en: And really the paramedic just said, "Just keep doing what you're doing.
translation.es: Lo que dijeron fue: "Sigan haciendo lo que estaban haciendo.

translation.en: Just keep reassuring. There's nothing else we can do."
translation.es: Sigan dándoles ánimo. No hay mucho más que podamos hacer".

translation.en: [Hazel] People had started gathering down on the waterfront there,
translation.es: La gente comenzó a reunirse en la costa,

translation.en: along the river mouth.
translation.es: en la desembocadura.

translation.en: I could see lots of ambulances, police.
translation.es: Había muchas ambulancias, policía.

translation.en: Um… it felt like every person
translation.es: Parecía que cada persona

translation.en: who was a frontline emergency staff member was there.
translation.es: que trabaja en emergencias estaba allí.

translation.en: [Isaac] Once we knew boats were on the way back,
translation.es: Cuando supimos que los barcos estaban regresando,

translation.en: that's when I'd go and clear the wharf for them
translation.es: despejamos el embarcadero

translation.en: because I knew they'd be heading through the first wharf and unloading.
translation.es: porque sabía que apenas llegaran, los bajarían.

translation.en: [man] We were just around trying to establish
translation.es: Estábamos allí tratando de decidir

translation.en: where we would set up the triaging for the people coming off the boats.
translation.es: dónde montar el triaje para las personas recién llegadas.

translation.en: [Mark] I had a little bit of denial, a little bit of disbelief.
translation.es: Estaba en estado de negación, de incredulidad.

translation.en: I thought, "You know what, I probably should just give Hayden a quick call."
translation.es: Pensé: "Voy a llamar a Hayden".

translation.en: And I tried ringing him and I got no reply.
translation.es: Lo llamé, pero nadie respondió.

translation.en: I guess being a small community,
translation.es: Somos una comunidad pequeña,

translation.en: your network of connections spreads a little bit wider.
translation.es: todos nos conocemos,

translation.en: And so my wife rang our family friend.
translation.es: entonces, mi esposa llamó a una amiga de la familia

translation.en: And asked if everything was all right,
translation.es: y le preguntó si todo estaba bien,

translation.en: and she said, "It's not good."
translation.es: y ella le dijo. "No, para nada".

translation.en: I picked the kids up and raced into town.
translation.es: Recogí a los niños y fui rápidamente al centro.

translation.en: [Maangi] We drove down to Whakatāne,
translation.es: Fuimos hasta Whakatane,

translation.en: straight to White Island Tours.
translation.es: directo a Tours Isla Blanca.

translation.en: We just saw the ambulances and um… police everywhere.
translation.es: Vimos ambulancias y policías por todas partes.

translation.en: They had the whole family around, um… we were all, you know, just waiting for news.
translation.es: Estaba con toda mi familia esperando noticias.

translation.en: [Jesse] I made it to a rocky outcrop,
translation.es: Llegué a un afloramiento de rocas,

translation.en: and you could see the view of the water, and I was like,
translation.es: vi el agua y pensé:

translation.en: "I made it," and then directly in front of me
translation.es: "Lo logré", y justo delante de mí

translation.en: was one of the crew members from the Phoenix.
translation.es: había alguien de la tripulación del Phoenix.

translation.en: -He had the radio to his mouth… -[indistinct radio chatter]
translation.es: Estaba hablando por radio

translation.en: …saying something like "That's it, it's… might be time to wrap up."
translation.es: y dijo algo como: "Listo, es hora de irnos".

translation.en: As soon as I heard that I just yelled with whatever energy that I had left.
translation.es: Apenas oí eso, grité con la energía que me quedaba.

translation.en: It was more like a scream.
translation.es: Fue más bien un alarido.

translation.en: And then he turned around with a wide-eyed expression,
translation.es: El tipo se volteó con ojos desorbitados,

translation.en: like the shock on his face saying like, "Holy, holy crap."
translation.es: y absolutamente sorprendido dijo: "Dios santo".

translation.en: And he straight away just said, "I have a survivor.
translation.es: Y de inmediato avisó: "Tengo un sobreviviente.

translation.en: Um… let's go."
translation.es: Vamos".

translation.en: And then when I flung my arms around his shoulders,
translation.es: Y cuando me tomé de sus hombros,

translation.en: I just remember saying "Uh, my family."
translation.es: recuerdo que le dije: "Mi familia".

translation.en: All I wanted to do the whole time was just get him to allow me to take him back
translation.es: Lo único que quería era que me permitiera llevarlo

translation.en: to where everyone else was.
translation.es: donde estaban los demás.

translation.en: He was like, "It'll be okay. We're going to get you back to the ship now."
translation.es: Me dijo: "Tranquilo, ahora te llevaremos a ti al barco".

translation.en: So we boarded the Te Puia and then departed.
translation.es: Subimos a bordo del Te Puia y partimos.

translation.en: [John] I'd lost track of all time because I was just so busy
translation.es: Perdí noción del tiempo, estaba muy ocupado

translation.en: trying to communicate with air traffic control.
translation.es: intentando comunicarme con tráfico aéreo.

translation.en: "We urgently need help out here. We just keep finding more survivors
translation.es: "Precisamos ayuda urgente, seguimos encontrando sobrevivientes

translation.en: and needing more help."
translation.es: y se necesita más ayuda".

translation.en: They called back, probably five minutes later,
translation.es: Llamaron de vuelta a los cinco minutos,

translation.en: and said "We've been directed by the Communication Center
translation.es: y dijeron: "El centro de comunicaciones nos indicó

translation.en: that we're not to go to the Island."
translation.es: que no podemos volver a la isla".

translation.en: [Andy] The decision was made at a higher level,
translation.es: La decisión fue tomada por las autoridades,

translation.en: that there'd been a no-fly zone put in place.
translation.es: se decretaría la zona de exclusión aérea.

translation.en: And this was due to the dangerous environment there around the Island.
translation.es: Debido a los peligros que rodeaban la isla.

translation.en: Quite toxic, quite acidic, and quite dangerous for any rescuers.
translation.es: Muy tóxico, ácido y peligroso para cualquier rescatista.

translation.en: And there was a high risk of another explosion.
translation.es: Y había un alto riesgo de que hubiera otra explosión.

translation.en: [man] At this stage, it is too dangerous
translation.es: En este momento, es demasiado peligroso

translation.en: for police and rescue services to go to the Island.
translation.es: que la policía y los rescatistas vayan a la isla.

translation.en: The Island is currently covered in ash and volcanic material.
translation.es: La isla está actualmente cubierta de ceniza y material volcánico.

translation.en: We are taking expert advice with regards to safety of any rescue attempt.
translation.es: Estamos asesorados por expertos en relación a los intentos de rescate.

translation.en: [John] I called Mark's team back on the ground again, and said,
translation.es: Llamé al equipo de Mark, que estaba allí, y le dije:

translation.en: "You just have to do what you can with what you've got.
translation.es: "Tienen que hacer lo que puedan con lo que tengan.

translation.en: You're on your own."
translation.es: Están solos".

translation.en: [Mark Law] He goes, "No, they're not coming."
translation.es: Dijo: "No van a venir".

translation.en: So I said, "Oh yeah? Uh, okay."
translation.es: Así que dije: "¿Ah, no? Bien".

translation.en: Then we essentially just moved into Plan B,
translation.es: Entonces implementaremos el plan B.

translation.en: and that was, "We're going to do it ourselves."
translation.es: Que era rescatarlos nosotros.

translation.en: [John] Mark and his team were facing a horrendous situation
translation.es: Mark y su equipo se enfrentaban a una situación horrenda

translation.en: with multiple patients with severe scalding burns.
translation.es: con varios pacientes con quemaduras severas.

translation.en: This is the stuff that nightmares are made out of.
translation.es: Básicamente, una pesadilla.

translation.en: [Mark Law] At that stage, we got everyone together
translation.es: A esa altura, reunimos a todos

translation.en: and it became a combined effort to identify the survivors,
translation.es: y, en un esfuerzo mancomunado, identificamos a los sobrevivientes

translation.en: and start to get them onboard the aircraft.
translation.es: y comenzamos a subirlos a bordo de la aeronave.

translation.en: It was just, "Let's get everyone who's still living off this island."
translation.es: Dijimos: "Quitemos de esta isla a todo aquel que siga con vida".

translation.en: Once we started to move people, we realized how severe the injuries were.
translation.es: Cuando empezamos a mover a la gente, vimos la gravedad de las heridas.

translation.en: Whole legs were just, you know, just blistered and trying to pick people up,
translation.es: Tenían las piernas llenas de ampollas,

translation.en: and skin was coming off in our hands,
translation.es: nos quedábamos con la piel en las manos

translation.en: and all over our clothing and things like that.
translation.es: y por toda la ropa.

translation.en: But you can't, you can't sit there and dwell about it.
translation.es: Pero no podíamos quedarnos de brazos cruzados.

translation.en: You eventually just got to get on and talk to people,
translation.es: Había que seguir y había que hablarles.

translation.en: tell them what you're going to do.
translation.es: Decirles lo que íbamos a hacer.

translation.en: "Okay, right, you're going in the helicopter.
translation.es: "Ahora te subiremos al helicóptero.

translation.en: We're gonna lift you up here.
translation.es: Te subiremos.

translation.en: You'll be 20 minutes away to a hospital."
translation.es: En 20 minutos llegaremos al hospital".

translation.en: You know, when people are down and out and nearly gone,
translation.es: Cuando la gente está mal, al borde la muerte,

translation.en: words are tremendously powerful.
translation.es: las palabras tienen mucho poder.

translation.en: And we didn't have time to pull up our seats.
translation.es: No teníamos tiempo de bajar los asientos.

translation.en: We had to, you know, lift people up right up high.
translation.es: Así que tuvimos que subir a la gente directamente.

translation.en: We used some seat belts, just to hold people up more than hold them in.
translation.es: Usamos los cintos de seguridad para tenerlos erguidos más que por seguridad.

translation.en: We finally got five people into the first helicopter, and then he left.
translation.es: Finalmente, subimos a cinco personas al primer helicóptero, y partió.

translation.en: So, we loaded my one up and then I lifted off.
translation.es: Llenamos el mío, y despegué yo.

translation.en: [Tim] I had one on board the aircraft,
translation.es: Yo tenía una persona a bordo,

translation.en: and then we got one more on board.
translation.es: y luego subimos a otra.

translation.en: We couldn't get any more in the back of my aircraft.
translation.es: No pudimos meter a ninguna más atrás.

translation.en: So then I got airborne with those two.
translation.es: Así que despegué con esos dos.

translation.en: I just remember thinking that I wish this helicopter would fly faster,
translation.es: Solo quería que el helicóptero volara más rápido

translation.en: and really my only thoughts flying back were
translation.es: y en lo único que pensé en ese viaje de regreso

translation.en: with the people in the back of my aircraft.
translation.es: fue en la gente que llevaba atrás.

translation.en: You know, we gave them water to try and uh, assist.
translation.es: Les dimos agua para intentar asistirlos.

translation.en: And to, you know… but yeah.
translation.es: Y eso… Sí.

translation.en: [John] That was a horrendous, huge effort on their part.
translation.es: Fue un esfuerzo horroroso y enorme de su parte.

translation.en: There was little more they could have done.
translation.es: No había mucho más que hacer.

translation.en: There were no more survivors left.
translation.es: No quedaban más sobrevivientes.

translation.en: The only people left on the island were the deceased.
translation.es: Los que quedaron en la isla estaban muertos.

translation.en: [Geoff] As we approach land, Mike the skipper said,
translation.es: 2 HORAS DESPUÉS DE LA ERUPCIÓN. Al acercarnos a la isla, el capitán, Mike, dijo:

translation.en: "Hold on because we're just going to go through this at full speed."
translation.es: "Sujétense porque iremos a máxima velocidad".

translation.en: [Jason] That boat did not stop when it went over that bar.
translation.es: El barco no frenó al pasar por el banco.

translation.en: It just carried at that speed up the river,
translation.es: Mantuvo la velocidad,

translation.en: which we had never seen before.
translation.es: lo cual es algo nunca visto.

translation.en: I remember thinking that, "You know, this boat is coming at speed for a reason."
translation.es: Pensé: "Si viene a esa velocidad, tiene que haber una razón".

translation.en: [Geoff] There was a line of paramedics, a line of police,
translation.es: Había una fila de paramédicos, una de policías

translation.en: a line of fire fighters,
translation.es: y una de bomberos.

translation.en: and they were just looking wide-eyed
translation.es: Todos muy atentos,

translation.en: trying to take in what they could see.
translation.es: intentando absorber lo que veían.

translation.en: I guess almost with shock.
translation.es: Creo que conmocionados.

translation.en: [Jason] That's when we got our first visual on the casualties.
translation.es: Allí pudimos ver por primera vez a las víctimas.

translation.en: I mean, I'd never seen… a human body
translation.es: Nunca había visto un cuerpo humano

translation.en: um, in an eruption, so I wasn't, you know, exactly sure…
translation.es: luego de una erupción, así que no estaba seguro

translation.en: what it would look like.
translation.es: de qué me esperaba.

translation.en: a police officer I'd seen coming in, with his hands full of Glad Wrap.
translation.es: un policía que vino repleto de film protector.

translation.en: They're trying to get all the stuff that they could
translation.es: Traían todo lo que podían

translation.en: from the local stores to cover the burn wounds.
translation.es: de las tiendas locales para cubrir heridas.

translation.en: [Matt] I heard Geoff yell to the paramedics,
translation.es: Escuché a Geoff gritarles a los paramédicos:

translation.en: "Get her off first. She's in critical condition."
translation.es: "Llévenla a ella primero, está en estado crítico".

translation.en: [Geoff] Matt walked off the boat which just amazed me.
translation.es: Matt salió caminando del barco, lo cual fue increíble.

translation.en: I was very clear that I did not want to be separated from her,
translation.es: Les dejé muy en claro que no quería separarme de ella,

translation.en: so they actually let me ride in the ambulance with her to the hospital.
translation.es: así que me dejaron viajar con ella en la ambulancia hasta el hospital.

translation.en: [Jason] Where I was, the three people I had, um…
translation.es: Donde yo estaba, tenía a tres personas,

translation.en: There was this moment when, um, one of them, um, just slumped,
translation.es: y en un momento, una de ellas se desplomó

translation.en: slumped on me.
translation.es: sobre mí.

translation.en: And um…
translation.es: Y…

translation.en: and I just think at that point in time,
translation.es: creo que allí,

translation.en: I just had my own little moment.
translation.es: me quebré.

translation.en: -[seagulls squawk] -[eerie music continues]
translation.es: POLICÍA

translation.en: Um, I remember standing up, taking a breath,
translation.es: Me puse de pie, respiré hondo,

translation.en: turning around, and facing the other side of the river,
translation.es: me volteé y miré al otro lado del río,

translation.en: and then turning back
translation.es: y volví a voltearme

translation.en: and just having total clarity of what we needed to do.
translation.es: y tuve totalmente claro qué hacer.

translation.en: [Kelsey] There was fire and ambulance, and police.
translation.es: Estaban los bomberos, las ambulancias y la policía.

translation.en: And somehow in that whole crowd,
translation.es: Y, de alguna manera, en medio de esa multitud,

translation.en: I managed to spot my mom and sister,
translation.es: vi a mi madre y a mi hermana.

translation.en: and I remember thinking, "They can't see me like this."
translation.es: Recuerdo que pensé: "No pueden verme así".

translation.en: So I got up and I couldn't actually straighten out my limbs.
translation.es: Me alcé, pero no podía enderezar las extremidades.

translation.en: And so I kind of had to walk a bit odd to the side of the boat…
translation.es: Fui caminando muy raro hacia el costado del barco,

translation.en: Beelined it straight for the ambulance,
translation.es: en línea recta hacia la ambulancia,

translation.en: 'cause I didn't want them to see me in that much pain.
translation.es: no quería que me vieran con tanto dolor.

translation.en: [news reporter] The first casualties from a volcanic eruption
translation.es: Las primeras víctimas de una erupción volcánica

translation.en: being stretchered from White Island clearly suffering burns.
translation.es: son trasladadas desde Isla Blanca con señales claras de quemaduras.

translation.en: Of course, there's still a number unaccounted for.
translation.es: Por supuesto, aún faltan varias.

translation.en: Twenty of them we believe are seriously injured.
translation.es: Veinte de ellas, creemos que con heridas de gravedad.

translation.en: [Mark] I race into town.
translation.es: Fui de prisa al centro.

translation.en: My mom and dad were there.
translation.es: Mis padres estaban allí.

translation.en: One of the skippers said, [in choked voice] "Hayden didn't come off.
translation.es: Uno de los capitanes dijo: "Hayden no salió.

translation.en: He isn't… hasn't come off."
translation.es: No salió".

translation.en: But he wasn't 100 percent sure where he was.
translation.es: Pero él no sabía con certeza dónde estaba.

translation.en: And we said… [stuttering] "But no, it's… it can't be. How?"
translation.es: Y dijimos: "No puede ser, ¿cómo es posible?".

translation.en: He said he didn't know whether he's on a helicopter or not. He wasn't sure.
translation.es: Dijo que no sabía si estaba en el helicóptero o no, no estaba seguro.

translation.en: [Mark Law] We had it tapped out, you know, it was going as fast as we could,
translation.es: Íbamos llenos, volábamos lo más rápido que se podía.

translation.en: probably 120 knots.
translation.es: A unos 120 nudos.

translation.en: There were some instructions coming from the Rescue Services,
translation.es: El servicio de rescate nos dio la instrucción

translation.en: that we were to fly to the airport with all the patients,
translation.es: de volar al aeropuerto con todos los pacientes,

translation.en: but I said "No, we're not doing that.
translation.es: pero yo dije: "No, no haremos eso.

translation.en: We're going to go to hospital."
translation.es: Iremos al hospital".

translation.en: It's just straight out of time, wasted time.
translation.es: Era lisa y llanamente tiempo perdido.

translation.en: I felt that Rescue Services, you know, they'd already let us down.
translation.es: Yo sentía que el servicio de rescate ya nos había fallado.

translation.en: So you know, the hospital wasn't going to let us down because we'd just arrive.
translation.es: El hospital no lo haría porque ya estábamos allí.

translation.en: They were going to go into that hospital
translation.es: Los íbamos a llevar al hospital,

translation.en: and you had lots of people that could take care of them quickly.
translation.es: donde había mucha gente que podría atenderlos rápido.

translation.en: [Matt] I had the thought, "My mom's going to wonder what happened
translation.es: Pensé: "Mi madre se va a preguntar qué fue de nosotros,

translation.en: to us when we just stop communicating with her at all."
translation.es: que de pronto dejamos de comunicarnos con ella".

translation.en: And I still had my cell phone with me. So, I asked one of the people nearby
translation.es: Yo todavía tenía mi móvil y le pedí a alguien por ahí

translation.en: to call my mom. I couldn't work it because it was a fingerprint unlock
translation.es: que la llamara, yo no podía por el desbloqueo con huellas,

translation.en: and I didn't have any fingerprints left.
translation.es: no me quedaban huellas dactilares.

translation.en: [Matt] Hi Mom, it's me. I just wanted to let you know,
translation.es: Hola, mamá, soy yo, quería avisarte,

translation.en: and this isn't a joke,
translation.es: y esto no es una broma,

translation.en: the volcano actually erupted while we were on the Island,
translation.es: que el volcán entró en erupción cuando estábamos en la isla,

translation.en: so we're at a hospital in New Zealand.
translation.es: estamos en un hospital en Nueva Zelanda.

translation.en: I don't know how long I'll be here,
translation.es: No sé cuánto tiempo estaré aquí,

translation.en: but I'll try and keep you updated as best I can.
translation.es: pero intentaré mantenerte al tanto todo lo posible.

translation.en: [Matt] At that point, we got separated.
translation.es: A esa altura, nos separamos.

translation.en: I didn't really understand how bad of shape I was in.
translation.es: Yo no tenía idea de lo mal que estaba.

translation.en: I certainly didn't expect I was going to be in a coma in…
translation.es: No pensé que estaría en coma

translation.en: in New Zealand for over a month or more.
translation.es: en Nueva Zelanda durante un mes.

translation.en: They cut off my wedding ring and I remember begging them
translation.es: Cortaron mi alianza de casamiento, y me acuerdo que les rogué

translation.en: not to do that because I had just gotten married.
translation.es: que no lo hicieran porque me acababa de casar.

translation.en: I was just heartbroken and… and I wouldn't look when they cut it off.
translation.es: Estaba desolada y no miré cuando me la cortaron.

translation.en: [Geoff] You go from a situation where
translation.es: Vives una situación urgente

translation.en: there's urgency to suddenly when the urgency stops.
translation.es: Vives una situación urgente y luego esa situación acaba.

translation.en: And it's not until that moment then,
translation.es: Recién cuando

translation.en: when suddenly what we were doing now had been passed
translation.es: lo que estábamos haciendo nosotros

translation.en: to a professional,
translation.es: pasó a un profesional,

translation.en: did we start to process what had just happened.
translation.es: empezamos a procesar lo que había pasado.

translation.en: I called my wife.
translation.es: Llamé a mi esposa.

translation.en: As soon as she answered, I couldn't talk.
translation.es: Y cuando respondió, no pude hablar.

translation.en: You know the tears just started [stuttering] to come out of nowhere.
translation.es: Las lágrimas comenzaron a brotar de la nada.

translation.en: [Brian] Everybody was very,
translation.es: Todos estaban

translation.en: you know, emotionally and physically wrecked at that stage.
translation.es: física y emocionalmente destrozados a esa altura.

translation.en: Jolene, my girlfriend, came over to pick me up, and I was able to,
translation.es: Jolene, mi novia, vino a recogerme

translation.en: you know, hug her and…
translation.es: y la abracé.

translation.en: that's, I think, when emotionally everything hit me for the first time.
translation.es: Creo que allí caí en la cuenta de todo por primera vez.

translation.en: [Maangi] We heard from the police there were eight still on the Island
translation.es: La policía nos dijo que todavía había ocho en la isla,

translation.en: on Whakaari, passed away.
translation.es: en Whakaari, muertos.

translation.en: Tipene was one of them.
translation.es: Tipene era uno de ellos.

translation.en: I dropped on the floor.
translation.es: Me desplomé en el suelo.

translation.en: I couldn't believe, I couldn't believe that I was hearing, you know…
translation.es: No podía creer lo que estaba escuchando.

translation.en: Parekura we call it. Tragedy.
translation.es: Nosotros lo llamamos parekura. Tragedia.

translation.en: [Mark] Once we got the word that the last helicopter landed,
translation.es: Cuando nos dijeron que había aterrizado el último helicóptero,

translation.en: you know, I actually rang Mark Law for an update of what was happening.
translation.es: llamé a Mark Law para que me diera un informe de la situación.

translation.en: [Mark Law stuttering] I just… I just, you know, I felt as friends,
translation.es: Sentí que, como amigo,

translation.en: you know, like uh… we just have to let them know,
translation.es: debía decírselo

translation.en: you know, as soon as possible.
translation.es: lo antes posible.

translation.en: You know, "I was there with Hayden and he definitely passed away."
translation.es: "Yo estuve allí con Hayden y no tengo dudas de que murió".

translation.en: He had seen Hayden, and um…
translation.es: Él lo vio a Hayden y…

translation.en: He'd seen him on the Island, and said that he hadn't made it.
translation.es: Lo vio en la isla y dijo que no lo había logrado.

translation.en: [Mark] Mark talked about seeing footsteps in the ash.
translation.es: Mark habló de unos pasos en la ceniza.

translation.en: And they believe that it was Hayden and Tipene that had moved about
translation.es: Y creen que fueron Hayden y Tipene que intentaron moverse

translation.en: and helped the final few, I guess,
translation.es: para ayudar a los que quedaban allí

translation.en: be comfortable in their last moments.
translation.es: a estar cómodos en sus últimos momentos.

translation.en: I know both Tipene and Hayden put everybody first, before themselves.
translation.es: Sé que Tipene y Hayden, siempre priorizaban a los demás.

translation.en: But he wasn't coming home.
translation.es: Pero él no volvió a casa.

translation.en: [woman] It is now clear that there were two groups on the Island,
translation.es: Ahora está claro que había dos grupos en la isla:

translation.en: those who were able to be evacuated
translation.es: los que pudieron ser evacuados

translation.en: and those who were close to the eruption.
translation.es: y los que estuvieron cerca de la erupción.

translation.en: To those who have lost or are missing family and friends,
translation.es: A las personas que han perdido a un familiar o amigo,

translation.en: we share in your unfathomable grief at this moment in time and in your sorrow.
translation.es: los acompañamos en este dolor inconmensurable y en su pena.

translation.en: Your loved one stood alongside Kiwis
translation.es: Sus seres queridos estuvieron acompañados por neozelandeses

translation.en: who were hosting you here and we grieve with you and we grieve with them.
translation.es: que los acogieron aquí, y lloramos su muerte con ellos y con ustedes.

translation.en: [reporter1] The official death toll from that volcanic eruption
translation.es: La cifra oficial de víctimas de la erupción volcánica

translation.en: in New Zealand now stands at eight.
translation.es: en Nueva Zelanda es de ocho personas.

translation.en: [reporter2] Nine of them have now been confirmed dead…
translation.es: Nueve son los muertos confirmados,

translation.en: -the latest, teenage brothers… -[reporter3 speaks in Mandarin]
translation.es: los últimos, los hermanos adolescentes…

translation.en: [reporter4] Death toll from Monday's disaster has now risen to at least 15.
translation.es: La cifra de muertos del desastre del lunes asciende al menos a 15.

translation.en: [reporter7] He was a dedicated public servant…
translation.es: Era un funcionario público dedicado…

translation.en: [reporter9] Among the 21 victims were her husband, Gavin,
translation.es: Entre las 21 víctimas, está su esposo, Gavin,

translation.en: and 15-year old daughter, Zoe.
translation.es: y su hija de 15 años, Zoe.

translation.en: [Kelsey] I didn't really know what had happened for three weeks.
translation.es: No supe lo que había pasado hasta pasadas tres semanas.

translation.en: No one had told me still,
translation.es: Nadie me había dicho nada aún.

translation.en: but a friend of mine came to visit me on the Burns Unit,
translation.es: Pero una amiga vino a visitarme a la unidad de quemados,

translation.en: and I'm like "Oh, how's Hayden? Like I'm surprised I haven't seen Hayden."
translation.es: y le pregunté: "¿Cómo está Hayden? Me sorprende no haberlo visto".

translation.en: And she just like looked at my family and yeah, they all burst into tears.
translation.es: Y ella miró a mi familia, y todos se echaron a llorar.

translation.en: And yeah, that's how I found out.
translation.es: Y así fue cómo me enteré.

translation.en: [Jesse] I woke up on the 17th of December.
translation.es: Desperté el 17 de diciembre.

translation.en: My grandfather was the one that… broke the terrible news to me.
translation.es: Mi abuelo fue el que me dio la terrible noticia.

translation.en: My father was rushed by Mark Law straight to the hospital,
translation.es: Mi padre había sido llevado al hospital por Mark Law,

translation.en: where unfortunately he, uh, succumbed to his injuries.
translation.es: pero, desafortunadamente, murió a causa de las heridas.

translation.en: Uh, my mother did pass away on the Island,
translation.es: Mi madre murió en la isla

translation.en: and she was uh…
translation.es: y fue…

translation.en: recovered by the New Zealand Army a few days later.
translation.es: recuperada por el Ejército neozelandés unos días después.

translation.en: And they're not sure where my sister was or what had happened to her body.
translation.es: Y de mi hermana no se sabía nada, ni se había encontrado el cuerpo.

translation.en: [Pouroto] When the ancestor, Tītahi, did die,
translation.es: Cuando nuestro ancestro Titahi murió,

translation.en: it is said in our folklore, that his spirit,
translation.es: según la tradición popular, su espíritu

translation.en: it had transformed as one of the guardians of the ocean today.
translation.es: se transformó en uno de los guardianes del océano.

translation.en: The dead themselves, they too have become similar to the ancestor Tītahi.
translation.es: Los muertos de la isla se han convertido en lo mismo que el ancestro Titahi.

translation.en: Whakaari has given her sanction, her consent,
translation.es: Whakaari ha aprobado, ha dado el consentimiento

translation.en: to have them there as guardians, kaitiaki, forevermore.
translation.es: de tenerlos como guardianes, kaitiaki, por siempre.

translation.en: They take their place in time where they will never be forgotten.
translation.es: Ocupan un lugar en el tiempo, donde jamás serán olvidados.

translation.en: [Lauren] Some days are good, some days aren't,
translation.es: Tengo días buenos y días malos.

translation.en: if you want me to be 100% honest with you.
translation.es: Para serles totalmente franca.

translation.en: I know people are looking at me; I know people are looking at my hands.
translation.es: Sé que la gente me mira, me miran las manos.

translation.en: Um… I don't like it.
translation.es: No me gusta.

translation.en: I always feel like I have to explain ahead of time
translation.es: Siento que siempre tengo que adelantarme a explicar

translation.en: what these are from. [laughs drily]
translation.es: por qué tengo esto.

translation.en: I have days where it's easier than others.
translation.es: Hay días que resulta más fácil que otros.

translation.en: [Matt] All right. So brussels sprouts on one side,
translation.es: Bien, repollitos de Bruselas de un lado,

translation.en: apples and sweet potatoes on the other.
translation.es: manzanas y batatas del otro.

translation.en: [Lauren] My husband and I are training to run in a half marathon,
translation.es: Mi esposo y yo estamos entrenando para correr una media maratón,

translation.en: so some days when I'm focused on things like running,
translation.es: entonces, los días en los que me concentro en correr,

translation.en: it's good, and yes, I can see my future.
translation.es: estoy bien y puedo ver el futuro.

translation.en: I can see happy days, and I can look past the volcano.
translation.es: Puedo ver días felices y dejar atrás el volcán.

translation.en: But, um… [sighs] Yeah, some days are really hard.
translation.es: Pero, sí, hay días que son muy duros.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: [Matt] My ring finger doesn't really work all that well,
translation.es: Mi dedo anular no funciona del todo bien,

translation.en: and that really messes with me on my dominant hand.
translation.es: y eso me complica porque es mi mano dominante.

translation.en: At this point, we're still getting a surgery a month.
translation.es: A esta altura, aún tenemos una cirugía por mes.

translation.en: The timeline with this recovery is just so, so, so long.
translation.es: Los tiempos de recuperación son extremadamente largos.

translation.en: The eruptions was two minutes, but the consequences are multiple years.
translation.es: La erupción duró dos minutos, pero las consecuencias duran varios años.

translation.en: I understand nobody controls nature,
translation.es: Entiendo que nadie controla la naturaleza,

translation.en: but you have to at least give me a chance to make an informed decision.
translation.es: pero al menos deben darme la opción de tomar una decisión a sabiendas.

translation.en: Had I known what I know now,
translation.es: Si hubiera sabido lo que sé ahora,

translation.en: there's zero percent chance we would have ever set foot on the island. Zero.
translation.es: la probabilidad de ir a esa isla sería absolutamente nula.

translation.en: [Kelsey] Yes, so I was burnt from my boot line
translation.es: Sufrí quemaduras desde la línea de las botas

translation.en: to my shorts line and the back of my legs,
translation.es: hasta la línea de los bermudas, y la parte trasera de las rodillas

translation.en: back to my knees was actually spared because being crouched down,
translation.es: se salvó porque estaba agachada

translation.en: it actually protected the backs of my knees which was good.
translation.es: y eso me protegió esa parte, por suerte.

translation.en: I knew what could happen out there.
translation.es: Yo sabía lo que podía pasar allí.

translation.en: But you don't believe it will happen to you.
translation.es: Pero nunca crees que te pasará a ti.

translation.en: This hasn't changed my opinion on how I will interact with nature.
translation.es: Esto no cambia la manera en la que interactúo con la naturaleza.

translation.en: I mean, I won't live in a padded room
translation.es: Ahora no voy a ser extracuidadosa

translation.en: because what kind of life is that?
translation.es: porque ¿qué clase de vida es esa?

translation.en: I guess I know that I can get through anything now,
translation.es: Hoy sé que puedo superar cualquier cosa,

translation.en: so I mean that's worth something.
translation.es: al menos me sirvió para eso.

translation.en: Maybe not to anyone else but to me, it's worth something. [laughs]
translation.es: Tal vez a los demás no les sirve, pero a mí, sí.

translation.en: [Jesse] Throughout my whole stay in hospital,
translation.es: Durante toda la estadía en el hospital,

translation.en: I made it a really strict point to take progress photos every other day,
translation.es: pedí expresamente que fotografiaran mi progreso cada dos días,

translation.en: so I can look back at them and see how far I've come.
translation.es: para poder mirar las fotos y ver la mejoría.

translation.en: I've had 17 surgeries.
translation.es: Tuve 17 cirugías.

translation.en: I was told that I would be spending a year in hospital.
translation.es: Me dijeron que estaría un año en el hospital.

translation.en: But I'm pretty proud to say that my total stay was
translation.es: Pero me enorgullece decir que mi internación

translation.en: just under two months.
translation.es: duró menos de dos meses.

translation.en: I'm a stubborn bastard.
translation.es: Soy muy testarudo.

translation.en: I refuse to give up. I'll just keep on trying and trying.
translation.es: Me niego a bajar los brazos, lo intento hasta el final.

translation.en: Uh, and I refuse to quit, no matter how hard it gets.
translation.es: Me niego a rendirme, no importa cuán difícil sea.

translation.en: I still love a risk.
translation.es: Me siguen gustando los riesgos.

translation.en: But calculated risk I think is the word that needs to be said.
translation.es: Pero un riesgo calculado, debo decir.

translation.en: They shouldn't have been there.
translation.es: No deberían haber estado allí.

translation.en: Should never go there.
translation.es: No debería haber ido nunca.

translation.en: I can see Whakaari from my home.
translation.es: Desde mi casa se ve Whakaari.

translation.en: I see it from every room in my home. Yeah.
translation.es: Se ve desde cada habitación.

translation.en: The less I see of it the better, to tell you the truth.
translation.es: Pero, cuanto menos la vea, mejor, para serles franca.

translation.en: So you just shut the curtain, let it be.
translation.es: Así que cierro la cortina y la dejo allí.

translation.en: Say a little prayer.
translation.es: Elevo una oración.

translation.en: Then you do the same thing the next day. And the next day and…
translation.es: Y al día siguiente, hago lo mismo.

translation.en: yeah.
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: [Mark] I think, you know, in some ways
translation.es: Creo que, de alguna manera,

translation.en: we understood the Island,
translation.es: entendíamos que la isla

translation.en: that it's an unknown outcome.
translation.es: era algo impredecible.

translation.en: Mother Nature does what she wants to do.
translation.es: La Madre Naturaleza hace lo que quiere.

translation.en: But there's also human nature.
translation.es: Pero también hay una naturaleza humana.

translation.en: And in the face of adversity,
translation.es: Ante una adversidad,

translation.en: it's human nature to go and help.
translation.es: lo humano es ir a ayudar.

translation.en: Ordinary people willing to give their own lives to help others.
translation.es: Gente común dispuesta a dar la vida por los demás.

translation.en: That's what makes people… the good people in the world who they are.
translation.es: Eso es lo que las hace buenas personas.

translation.en: [Kelsey] A lot of positive has come from such a horrific event.
translation.es: Hubo muchas cosas positivas que surgieron de ese suceso horrendo.

translation.en: The Community Support has been quite overwhelming.
translation.es: El apoyo de la comunidad ha sido arrollador.

translation.en: I have friendships that I wouldn't trade for the world.
translation.es: Tengo amigos que no cambiaría por nada en el mundo.

translation.en: You have to take something positive
translation.es: Hay que buscarle el lado bueno

translation.en: because otherwise that cloud will just follow you forever.
translation.es: porque, si no, es una nube negra que te sigue para siempre.

translation.en: [Jesse] My gym, and my work colleagues,
translation.es: Mi gimnasio y mis compañeros de trabajo,

translation.en: my friends, my family,
translation.es: mis amigos y mi familia

translation.en: are who all push me to keep on going.
translation.es: son los que me empujan para que siga adelante.

translation.en: They've given me the drive to keep working hard.
translation.es: Me dan el impulso para que siga esforzándome.

translation.en: Especially my grandfather, my rock.
translation.es: Especialmente mi abuelo, que es mi gran apoyo.

translation.en: He's been with me from the very beginning.
translation.es: Él estuvo conmigo desde el comienzo.

translation.en: And I would never have been able to make it this far without his love and support.
translation.es: Y nunca podría haber llegado aquí sin su amor y su apoyo.

translation.en: [Matt I have a perfect unburnt spot on my wrist.
translation.es: Tengo una zona totalmente libre de quemaduras en la muñeca.

translation.en: That is the exact outline of where her hand was.
translation.es: Es exactamente donde estaba la mano de ella.

translation.en: [Lauren] It was like this.
translation.es: La tenía así.

translation.en: Yep, that's why this hand is much better than this hand.
translation.es: Por eso esta mano está mucho mejor que esta.

translation.en: Like I can't even make a fist in this hand, and this hand,
translation.es: Con esta ni siquiera puedo cerrar el puño,

translation.en: I can make a fist fully.
translation.es: pero con esta, sí, completamente.

translation.en: I will always be by his side. Always.
translation.es: Siempre voy a estar a su lado, siempre.

translation.en: I just love him so much and this has made us even closer, I feel like.
translation.es: Lo amo mucho y siento que esto nos unió aún más.

translation.en: [Mark] I try to get out there every couple of months and go and say, "Hi."
translation.es: Intento ir a saludarlo al cabo de unos meses.

translation.en: And Hayden's favorite drink was a Steinlager beer,
translation.es: El trago favorito de Hayden era la cerveza Steinlager.

translation.en: you know, a good Kiwi beer.
translation.es: Una buena cerveza neozelandesa.

translation.en: And we take a dozen out with us and we sit out there and whoever's with us,
translation.es: Nos llevamos un docena y nos sentamos aquí, los que seamos,

translation.en: we have a couple of drinks and we always pour one in the ocean, you know?
translation.es: bebemos algunas y echamos una al mar.

translation.en: As much as I hate wasting one, [chuckling] we always pour one in
translation.es: Odio desperdiciar una, pero la echamos igual.

translation.en: and give him a drink. [chuckles]
translation.es: Para él.

translation.en: So you do, you look for little moments and you look for signs,
translation.es: Uno se aferra a pequeños momentos y busca señales

translation.en: I guess to find your ways of moving forward.
translation.es: supongo que para seguir adelante.

translation.en: In the face of Mother Nature, and all that she can throw at us,
translation.es: Ante la Madre Naturaleza y todo lo que nos puede deparar,

translation.en: we've still got to remember that as humans, we'll always have each other.
translation.es: debemos recordar que las personas nos tenemos unas a otras.

translation.en: Subtitle translation by: Ayolope Koiki
translation.es: Traducción de subtítulos: Guadalupe Anzoátegui
